main_definition: Purchases refers to the act of buying or acquiring goods, services, or other items by paying a certain price in exchange.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The total amount spent on buying goods
meanings_and_examples.example: I made several purchases at the grocery store today and ended up spending over $100.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Transactions in which items are acquired by paying money
meanings_and_examples.example: Our company recorded 50 new transactions as purchases yesterday.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Items or products bought on credit and to be paid for later
meanings_and_examples.example: The store allows customers to purchase items on installment, meaning they can pay over time instead of immediately.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A record of the goods that have been sold by a retailer or wholesaler
meanings_and_examples.example: Before making any purchases, I like to check my suppliers' purchase orders to see what items are available.
